headline: Exelon Names Elizabeth Pitts-Madonna Senior Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer
summary: CHICAGO, November 20, 2025--Exelon (NASDAQ: EXC) Exelon today announced that Elizabeth (Beth) Pitts-Madonna has been appointed senior vice president and chief human resources officer, effective Jan. 1, 2026. She will succeed Denise Galambos, who is retiring at the end of the year after a distinguished 21-year career with the company.
